    BAS()

    Do something useful.

    BASMastersample()

    BASMastersample.R Do something useful.

    buildMS()

    Build a new Master Sample with a random rotation and seed.

    Do something useful.

    a title

    Do something useful.

    HaltonFrames()

    Do something useful.

    SRS()

    Do something useful.

    SolveCongruence()

    Solve system of linear congruence from HIP paper to order HIP boxes.

    SpacialBalanceMeasures()

    Do something useful.

    SpatialStratification()

    Do something useful.

    VarianceEstimators()

    Do something useful.

    compareBoxesBoxInit()

    title.

    cppHaltonSeq()

    Draw Halton Sequence values for a single dimension.

    cppRSHalton()

    Generate numbers from a Halton Sequence with a random start

    cppSumPoweredElements()

    Raise each element in a vector by a corresponding power provided in another vector, then return the sum of all the results.

    cppWhere2Start()

    Internal function to find the ordering of the first box according to the random seed.

    getBB()

    Get the bounding box for other functions.

    getIndividualBoxIndices()

    Get the Halton Box Index for a point.

    getProj()

    Define spatial objects in projection of the master sample.

    getRotation()

    Returns the radians of rotation of the bounding box.

    getSeed()

    Random seed definition for Western Canada Marine Master Sample.

    log_a_to_base_b()

    Compute the log of a to base b.

    makeFrame()

    Create a Halton Frame raster, defined in sf based on the bounding box master sample.

    masterSampleSelect()

    Generate sample points using BAS master sample.

    point2Frame()

    a title

    rot()

    Generate a rotation matrix for rotating objects later.

    rotate.bb()

    Rotate Bounding box by theta radians

    rotate.scale.coords()

    Scale and rotate points from the unit square to a defined projection.

    rotate.shp()

    Rotate a polygon around the centroid of a Master Sample bounding box.

    shape2Frame()

    Clip a Halton Frame based on the bounding box to the current shape.

    xmasterSample()

    Select pts from a polygon using a BAS Master Sample.
